mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.message_id messageId FROM email_mail a WHERE (a.to_people = #{userAddress} OR INSTR(CONCAT(',', a.to_cc, ','), CONCAT(',', #{userAddress}, ',')) OR INSTR(CONCAT(',', a.to_bcc, ','), CONCAT(',', #{userAddress}, ','))) AND a.state = #{state}
